---
name: HIS3
creator: keoni
description: S. cerevisiae HIS3 selectable marker
prefix: CGCT
suffix: ACTC
sequence: 
---

Gene encoding imidazoleglycerol-phosphate dehydratase in the histidine biosynthesis pathway of S. cerevisiae. Enables growth on histidine-free media for auxotrophic strains lacking functional HIS3.
